title: Binary to Position
extract: It is analogous to the least significant digit of a decimal integer, which is the digit in the ones (right-most) position. It is common to assign each bit a position number, ranging from zero to N-1, where N is the number of bits in the binary representation used.
extract_html: It is analogous to the least significant digit of a decimal integer, which is the digit in the ones (right-most) position. It is common to assign each bit a position number, ranging from zero to N-1, where N is the number of bits in the binary representation used.
